product_description: Dilettante Mocha Cafe brand L'Orange Dark Bulk Truffles, perishable, sold individual pieces out of retail display cases.  The display placard declares milk in the ingredients statement, but the Contains statement declares "Contains: Dairy".  Bulk truffle boxes sent to retail stores contains correct label: "***Dilettante Mocha Cafe L'Orange Dark Bulk Truffles*** UPC 10083 15048***Contains: Milk***Dilettante Mocha Cafe, Tukwila, WA 98188, dilettantemochacafe.com"
reason_for_recall: The firm's retail placard posted on display case declares milk in the ingredients statement, but the placard declares "Contains Dairy" only.
code_info: Manufactured 6/4/2023 and bulk case includes best by date 11/4/23.
